column4: [Chameleon] , i understand, but the server is there for a reason, to store everything on it except the os
so if you hd is gone, your /home is gone, and i want to avoid that
seems there is something wrong with the connect to server module in the location menu
did you select the FTP protocol?
are you trying to connect to the xbox?
that means passive mode isnt supported by the xbox server
that makes you a bit stuck :\
i know why it dosent work
i dont think theres anything you can do about it unfortunely
just have to use gftp i guess :\
